title: MILF
summary: MILF (/mÉªlf/, as if read as "milf") is an acronym that stands for "Mother I'd Like to Fuck".[1][2][3] This abbreviation is used in colloquial English, instead of the whole phrase. It connotes a sexually attractive older woman, typically one who has children.[1][2][4][5] The phrase's usage has gone from relatively obscure to mainstream in the media and entertainment. A related term is cougar, which suggests an older woman in active pursuit of younger men.
